participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, Emily is always striving for success and has a strong desire to excel in her career.
participant_1.background: i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i grew up in manhattan. i plan to go to business school next year. i drive a bmw.

participant_2.name: Michael Johnson
participant_2.personality: Caring and supportive, Michael is passionate about his work and loves to spend time with his family. He values education and nurturing talent.
participant_2.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. my favorite movie is friday. i am a doctor. i enjoy going to the park. i'm now looking for a new job.
